name: Ghost Cave
description:
There are ghosts... and you're in a cave... therefore, GHOSTCAVE.

Features
  • 8 levels
  • adorable ghosts
  • Pits of acid
  • etc.
Controls

Left /Right arrows or A/D keys to move.

Spacebar to jump.

X key to shoot.

Q key to return to the Start Screen.

//psssst... hit the P key to skip past tricky levels//

Known issues:

  • The moving ghostie platforms make the camera feel a little wonky while you're standing on it.
  • There's no audio, but that's just because I didn't add any.
  • The shooting animation's definitely off, but the actual shooting functionality works fine so eh (shrugs).
  • The gravity feels REALLY FAST and it may be even faster on really high end computers. 

Made within 3 days for MiniJam #117 (This was my first jam!)

Fonts used are from KENNEY.
